title: Sweeptoken
author: Sweeptoken
content: Sweep Token is the power behind the Sweep Project. Sweep Token brings Meme with Utility.Holding Sweep Tokens will allow you to participate in our draws and also give you the power to vote for collections we sweep and community decisions.Read More About Sweep Utility And SWEEP MEME Token.https://www.sweepproject.com/utility.phphttps://www.sweepproject.com/sweeptoken.phpHolding Sweep Token also has great Tokenomics and you earn reflections from holding it.https://www.sweepproject.com/reflections.phpWe are a new start up and plan to compete with bigger meme projects. Example PITBULL TOKENWe have big plans for our token.https://www.sweepproject.com/about.phphttps://www.sweepproject.com/roadmap.phpOfficial Linkshttps://www.sweepproject.com/https://t.me/sweepprojecthttps://twitter.com/sweeepnftThank you for reading.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Seen now you are building strength for promised so that this project gets more attention from people, I think you will be able to reach it when you increase trust and make your products more useful

comments.author: Sweeptoken
comments.body: Thanks we are working hard. Our main priority is to increase holders.  We have applied for Coinmarketcap but not heard back as of yet. We publish updates on our twitter daily and also on our website. we had 165 participants in our latest draw and someone won the NFT valued at 0.8 BNB. So they done well.  what we are finding is people are reluctant to sell any sweep even though we have small holders for now.We are up 18 holders since yesterday. if we can build on that each day we will be in a good position. Our project is very new. we are in this for the long haul and will give it 100%. Feel free to join the TGQuote from: Blowon on September 24, 2022, 07:33:59 PMSeen now you are building strength for promised so that this project gets more attention from people, I think you will be able to reach it when you increase trust and make your products more useful

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: right now i saw there are 3 live draws. So, can i join 3 of them at the same time if i hold 100 trillion sweep tokens?or i can just join 1 of them? because i don't see any rules regarding the live draw.

comments.body: To compete with the larger meme coinswe have increased the reflection rewards of sweep to 6%This will speed up the burn of sweep token.People can also check how much they have earned on the website.

comments.body: Quote from: Sweeptoken on October 04, 2022, 03:38:06 PMTo compete with the larger meme coinswe have increased the reflection rewards of sweep to 6%This will speed up the burn of sweep token.People can also check how much they have earned on the website.as time goes by the 6% reflection reward will of course cost more, will you continue to pay?how do you manage finances without having to involve token prices which will certainly deteriorate without any income from the product?
